revised_title: Photographic Image of Stratified Discharges in Hydrogen Tubes
tldr: W. Spottiswoode shares his findings on the successful photography of stratified discharges in hydrogen tubes using a revolving mirror and a sensitive plate. The photographic image reveals the position, proper motion, and grouping of striae with different actinic power and color. Spottiswoode plans to present a more comprehensive study in the future.
